mapper.select: select t.task_no, t.task_title, t.task_regdate, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(t.task_content, dbms_LoB.GETLENGTH(t.TASK_CONTENT)) as task_content, m.email, m.name, m.picture, s.study_no, s.study_name from member m, study_member sm, study s, task t where sm.email = m.email and sm.STUDY_NO = t.STUDY_NO and sm.email = t.email and sm.study_no = s.study_no and t.TASK_NO = #{value}
